bomberman.core.graphics
Class Sprite

java.lang.Object
  bomberman.core.graphics.Sprite

 class Sprite
extends java.lang.Object

The Sprite class contains all details about the animation that will be played through the SpritePlayer. This implementation assumes square frame.

See Also:
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sprite_(computer_graphics)

Field Summary
private  float frameTime
          The time each frame will be displayed.
private  boolean isLooping
          The is looping.
private  playn.core.Image texture
          The sprite sheet image consist of a horizontal stripe which contains all the frames.
 
Constructor Summary
Sprite(playn.core.Image texture, boolean isLooping)
          Instantiates a new sprite. for simplicity we assume square frames, it therefore appears that the image will be wide x times its height
Sprite(playn.core.Image texture, float frameTime, boolean isLooping)
          Instantiates a new sprite. for simplicity we assume square frames, it therefore appears that the image will be wide x times its height

Constructor Detail

Sprite

public Sprite(playn.core.Image texture,
              boolean isLooping)
Instantiates a new sprite. for simplicity we assume square frames, it therefore appears that the image will be wide x times its height

Parameters:
texture - the sprite sheet
isLooping - if true, once the animation has been reproduced, it will restart automatically
See Also:
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sprite_(computer_graphics)

Sprite

public Sprite(playn.core.Image texture,
              float frameTime,
              boolean isLooping)
Instantiates a new sprite. for simplicity we assume square frames, it therefore appears that the image will be wide x times its height

Parameters:
texture - the sprite sheet
isLooping - if true, once the animation has been reproduced, it will restart automatically
frameTime - The time each frame will be displayed.

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sprite_(computer_graphics)
